                                   * Heuristically chosen max length to buffer a Type1 font

                                  private static final long MAX_LENGTH = 100_000_000;                                               
                             +    // Maximum total bytes allowed for reading PFB input                                              
                             +    private static final long MAX_PFB_BYTES = MAX_LENGTH + PFB_HEADER_LENGTH;                         
                                                                                                                                    
                                  /**                                                                                               
                                   * the parsed pfb-data.                                                                           
                                   */                                                                                               
                                  private byte[] pfbdata;                                                                           
                             +                                                                                                      
                             +    /**                                                                                               
                             +     * Read InputStream up to a limit to avoid OutOfMemoryError                                       
                             +     */                                                                                               
                             +    private static byte[] readAllBytesWithLimit(InputStream in, long maxAllowed)                      
                             throws IOException                                                                                     
                             +    {                                                                                                 
                             +        ByteArrayOutputStream baos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();                                     
                             +        byte[] buffer = new byte[8192];                                                               
                             +        int len;                                                                                      
                             +        long total = 0;                                                                               
                             +        while ((len = in.read(buffer)) != -1)                                                         
                             +        {                                                                                             
                             +            total += len;                                                                             
                             +            if (total > maxAllowed)                                                                   
                             +            {                                                                                         
                             +                throw new IOException("PFB input stream too large: " + total);                        
                             +            }                                                                                         
                             +            baos.write(buffer, 0, len);                                                               
                             +        }                                                                                             
                             +        return baos.toByteArray();                                                                    
                             +    }                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                    
                                  /**                                                                                               
                                   * the lengths of the records (ASCII, BINARY, ASCII)                                              
                             @@ -90,9 +114,13 @@

                                   * @throws IOException if an IO-error occurs.                                                     
                                   */

                             -    {

                             +    {

                             +        {                                                                                             
                             +            byte[] pfb = readAllBytesWithLimit(in, MAX_PFB_BYTES);

                             == libFuzzer crashing input ==                                                                         
                             ===Evaluation Report===                                                                                
                             # Evaluation Report                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
                             ## Summary                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                    
                             An out-of-memory error was observed when fuzzing PDF text extraction functionality.                    
                             The fuzzer reported a `FuzzerSecurityIssueLow: Out of memory` triggered by a                           
                             `java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space` while parsing a PFB (Printer Font                        
                             Binary) font within the Apache PDFBox/FontBox library.                                                 
                                                                                                                                    
                             ## Description                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
                             - The issue manifests as a `java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space` during the                    
                             execution of font parsing routines in Apache FontBox, specifically within the                          
                             `PfbParser.parsePfb` method.                                                                           
                             - The fuzzer framework (Jazzer) classified this as a low-severity security issue                       
                             (`FuzzerSecurityIssueLow`) tied to resource exhaustion.                                                
                             - Key observations from the stack trace:                                                               
                                The exception originates at                                                                        
                             `org.apache.fontbox.pfb.PfbParser.parsePfb(PfbParser.java:166)`.                                       
                                The font parsing chain continues through `Type1Font.createWithPFB`,                                
                             `PDType1Font.<init>`, and `PDFontFactory.createFont`.                                                  
                                The error surfaces during PDF text extraction in `PDFTextStripper.getText`,                        
                             invoked by the fuzzers `fuzzerTestOneInput` method.                                                   
                                The failure is reproducible with increased heap settings (e.g., `-Xmx1710m`),                      
                             indicating a large memory footprint for the input font data.                                           
                                                                                                                                    
                             - Vulnerability type: Resource exhaustion (heap space exhaustion) in font parsing                      
                             code.                                                                                                  
                             - Important findings:                                                                                  
                                The crash is rooted in PFB font parsing, not in the harness itselfthe harness                     
                             simply directs input into the PDF text stripper.                                                       
                                The input triggers unbounded memory usage in the PFB parser, suggesting that                       
                             certain PFB structures or lengths lead to excessive allocations.                                       
                                                                                                                                    
                             - Areas of the codebase to review for a comprehensive understanding:                                   
                               1. org.apache.fontbox.pfb.PfbParser (methods: `parsePfb`, constructors)                              
                               2. org.apache.fontbox.type1.Type1Font (method: `createWithPFB`)                                      
                               3. org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDType1Font (constructor and initialization logic)                 
                               4. org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDFontFactory (method: `createFont`)                               
                               5. org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.PDResources (method: `getFont`)                                         
                               6. org.apache.pdfbox.text.PDFTextStripper and supporting stream engine code for font                 
                             setup                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                    
                             Investigating these components will provide visibility into how PFB data is read,                      
                             validated, and buffered, and where memory usage could grow without bounds.                             
                                                                                                                                    
                             ## Initial Issue Log                                                                                   
                             Here is the initial issue log of the codebase:                                                         
                             <issue>

                             1:/*
