                             ```                                                                                                    
                             106:        parsePfb(pfb);                                                                             
                             107:    }                                                                                              
                             ```                                                                                                    
                             </code>                                                                                                
                             <code>                                                                                                 
                             fontbox/src/main/java/org/apache/fontbox/type1/Type1Font.java:50-58                                    
                             ```                                                                                                    
                             50:     * @throws IOException if something went wrong                                                  
                             51:     */                                                                                             
                             52:    public static Type1Font createWithPFB(InputStream pfbStream) throws IOException                 
                             53:    {                                                                                               
                             54:        PfbParser pfb = new PfbParser(pfbStream);                                                   
                             55:        Type1Parser parser = new Type1Parser();                                                     
                             56:        return parser.parse(pfb.getSegment1(), pfb.getSegment2());                                  
                             57:    }                                                                                               
                             58:                                                                                                    
                             ```                                                                                                    
                             </code>                                                                                                
                             </code_snippets>

                             == libFuzzer crashing input ==                                                                         
                             ===Evaluation Report===                                                                                
                             # Evaluation Report                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
                             ## Summary                                                                                             
                             An out-of-memory error was observed when parsing large PFB font data in Apache FontBox                 
                             under a fuzzing harness. The initial stack trace showed a Java heap space OOME                         
                             originating in `PfbParser.parsePfb()`, leading through PDFBoxs font and                               
                             textextraction classes. A patch was introduced to limit the total PFB input                           
                             sizereplacing `readAllBytes()` with a buffered read into a `ByteArrayOutputStream`,                   
                             enforcing a `MAX_PFB_BYTES` threshold (200 MB), and guarding the `parsePfb(byte[])`                    
                             entry point. Despite these changes, the fuzzer still triggers an OOME in `parsePfb()`,                 
                             indicating the patch did not eliminate the excessive memory allocation within that                     
                             method.                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                    
                             ## Description                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
                             1. Initial Issue                                                                                       
                                - A Java exception `com.code_intelligence.jazzer.api.FuzzerSecurityIssueLow: Out of                 
                             memory` was reported; the root cause is `java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space`.                 
                                - The crash occurs in                                                                               
                             `org.apache.fontbox.pfb.PfbParser.parsePfb(PfbParser.java:166)`. The stack further                     
                             traces through `Type1Font.createWithPFB`, `PDFType1Font.<init>`,                                       
                             `PDFontFactory.createFont`, and ultimately the PDF text-stripping routines invoked by                  
                             the fuzzer.                                                                                            
                                - The issue demonstrates that extremely large or maliciously crafted PFB data can                   
                             exhaust the JVM heap during parsing.                                                                   
                                                                                                                                    
                             2. Patch Attempt                                                                                       
                                - Introduced a new constant:                                                                        
                                  `private static final long MAX_PFB_BYTES = 200_000_000L;`                                         
                                - In the `PfbParser(InputStream)` constructor:                                                      
                                   Swapped out `in.readAllBytes()` for a manual loop reading 8 KB chunks into a                    
                             `ByteArrayOutputStream`.                                                                               
                                   Tracked cumulative bytes read and threw an `IOException` if the total exceeds                   
                             `MAX_PFB_BYTES`.                                                                                       
                                - In `parsePfb(byte[])`:                                                                            
                                   Added an early check `if (pfb.length > MAX_PFB_BYTES) throw new                                 
                             IOException(...)`.                                                                                     
                                - Updated imports to include `java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream`.                                       
                                                                                                                                    
                             3. Result After Patch                                                                                  
                                - Running under the same fuzzing conditions still leads to an OOME in                               
                             `PfbParser.parsePfb(...)` (now reported at a different line number, 183).                              
                                - The stack trace remains otherwise unchanged: the error propagates out of                          
                             `parsePfb` into the PDF extraction pipeline.                                                           
                                - The new size checks prevent exceedingly large raw reads but do not address                        
                             unbounded allocations within the parsing logic itself.                                                 
                                                                                                                                    
                             4. Areas for Further Investigation                                                                     
                                - The implementation of `parsePfb(byte[])`: examine how it constructs internal data                 
                             structures and whether it creates large intermediate buffers (for example, during                      
                             segment concatenation or ASCII-to-binary conversions).                                                 
                                - The handling of PFB segments in methods called by `parsePfb`, e.g.,                               
                             `parseSegments` or low-level stream manipulations, to identify other unbounded reads                   
                             or expansions.                                                                                         
                                - Interactions between FontBoxs PFB parser and PDFBoxs font wrapping                              
                             (`Type1Font.createWithPFB`), to see if additional buffering or caching occurs.                         
                                - Upstream fuzzer harness constraints to confirm whether it can supply data near                    
                             the size threshold, and whether the threshold itself needs adjustment.                                 
                                                                                                                                    
                             ## Initial Issue Log                                                                                   
                             Here is the initial issue log of the codebase:                                                         
                             <issue>
